abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze an input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.
Define, apply, or analyze a systematic transformation or mapping that converts input entity(ies) into corresponding output representation(s) or state(s).

Apply one or more defined operations or sequences of operations to an input entity or representation to produce a corresponding output entity or representation, including specifying the necessary conditions or rules to achieve the desired transformation.
Define criteria and systematically assess inputs to identify, characterize, compare, or rank their properties, behaviors, or roles according to specified conditions or standards.
End of current sequential code flow
